# Kurdish Book Store - Copilot Instructions

This is a multilingual Kurdish book store website with support for Kurdish Sorani, English, and German languages.

## Project Structure
- Next.js 14 with TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS for styling
- i18n for internationalization
- Book management system
- E-commerce functionality

## Key Features
- Book categorization (Kurdish literature, poetry, history, children's books, etc.)
- Multilingual support (Kurdish Sorani, English, German)
- Professional design inspired by 30book.com
- Responsive layout
- Search functionality
- Shopping cart system
- User authentication

## Development Guidelines
- Use semantic HTML and accessibility best practices
- Follow Kurdish language RTL text direction for Kurdish content
- Maintain professional e-commerce design standards
- Focus on book discovery and user experience
